summary: A tough young man, who helps to kick poor people out of their houses, falls in love with a girl. She lives with her father in the building about to be demolished.
cast: Pedro Armendáriz|Katy Jurado|Rosita Arenas|Andrés Soler|Beatriz Ramos|Paco Martínez|Roberto Meyer|Gloria Mestre|Paz Villegas|José Muñoz|Diana Ochoa|Ignacio Villalbazo|Joaquín Roche|Guillermo Bravo Sosa|Efraín Arauz|Lupe Carriles|Raquel García|Victorio Blanco|Enrique Carrillo|José Chávez|Enedina Díaz de León|Jaime Fernández|José Luis Fernández|Jesús García|Salvador Godínez|Jesús Gómez|Leonor Gómez|Isabel Herrera|Francisco Ledesma|Cecilia Leger|Margarito Luna|Ignacio Peón|Jorge Ponce|Polo Ramos|Amelia Rivera|Ángela Rodríguez
title: El bruto
